detail_desc: Dungarees in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, adjustable straps and a visible zip at one side. Chest pocket, coin pocket, side pockets and back pockets. Slim, ankle-length legs.

Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy cotton weave with elastication and a wide flounce at the top.

Calf-length dress in a softly draping viscose weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck and a decorative, draped pleat at the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with wide cuffs and covered buttons, and a detachable soft fabric belt with metal D-rings. Lined.

Hat in braided paper straw. Width of brim 3.5 cm.

Lightly padded, quilted nylon jacket with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbed cuffs. Lined.
Large necklace with plastic beads of various sizes covered in patterned satin. Diameter of beads 2-4 cm. Adjustable fastener, approx. 49-57 cm.
Straight jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a wide stand-up collar, low dropped shoulders and wide sleeves.

Shorts in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist, kangaroo pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Metal earrings with a plastic bead.

Wrapover bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with short puff sleeves. Decorative scalloped edges, a sewn-on bow, and press-studs at the side and crotch. One with an all-over print and one in pointelle.

Set with a T-shirt, shorts and cap in soft organic cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif and press-studs at the shoulders. Shorts with ribbing and a decorative tie at the waist. Jersey-lined cap with a print motif on the front and elastication at the back.

Shirt in a cotton and linen weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Shirt in a cotton and linen weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Fitted trousers in sturdy jersey with a concealed zip in the side and slim legs with a concealed zip at the hems.
Knee-length shorts in soft washed cotton with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Short, wrapover skirt in a soft jacquard weave with a contrasting colour pattern with raw edges. Tab and metal rings at one side and an inner button. Unlined.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with embroidered details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Dungarees in a patterned, organic cotton weave with straps that button at the front. Open side pockets, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and elasticated hems.

Set in soft organic cotton jersey. Short-sleeved, patterned bodysuit with decorative buttons at the top and press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Shorts with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Short dress in airy lace with short sleeves, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Lined.
Short V-neck dress in airy chiffon with short butterfly sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and a lace trim at the hem. Lined.
Short V-neck dress in airy chiffon with short butterfly sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and a lace trim at the hem. Lined.
Jumper in a fine-knit modal and cotton blend with a ribbed polo neck and long sleeves.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with a washed look. Elasticated drawstring waist, welt side pockets, a print motif on one leg and ribbed hems.

Cargo trousers in soft, stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening and fake back pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Loafers with a decorative seam at the front and metal rings at the top. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 1.5 cm.

Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with buttons at the top, crotch and down the legs. Long raglan sleeves, an open back pocket and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Long earrings in metal and fabric with tassels. Length 14.5 cm.
